name: NeutralizeBadSongs
description: Replace songs (and songs by artists) you dislike. (Alt name: LazyJukebox)

configdir.name: Edit Replacement Songs Pool, "Banned" Artists + Song IDs
configdir.description:
<cy>(Hopefully.)</c>
This setting does literally nothing new except being a button that acts as a shortcut to open the config directory for this mod (which is kind of important for using this mod properly, because this is where you will store your replacement songs, banned artists, and banned song IDs), because the legendary developers in the Geode Team themselves forgot to add a shortcut button that would have done this exact same thing, and I have gotten far too many folks (rightfully) asking me to find the config directory when using some of my other mods, and I hate repeating the same things over and over again, and I don't know if the next major update for Geode will also repeat this mistake where HJfod forgets to include a config directory shortcut button, so this setting and this button are here for extra insurance, so please enjoy this extra button, I guess. Anyway, by the time you're finished reading this, your device should be finished with opening the config directory; press "Aight" to close this window.

updatelists.name: Refresh Replacement Songs Pool, "Banned" Artists + Song IDs
updatelists.description: Refreshes your replacement songs, banned artists, and banned song IDs.

randomReplacementEveryAttempt.name: Use Random Replacement Song During Every Attempt
randomReplacementEveryAttempt.description: Works when you have <cl>Only Use One Replacement Song For All Banned Songs</c> disabled.

onlyOneReplacement.name: Only Use One Replacement Song For All Banned Songs/Artists
onlyOneReplacement.description: Works when you have <cl>Use Random Replacement Song During Every Attempt</c> disabled.

treatUndownloadedSongsAsBlacklistedSongs.name: Treat Songs You Haven't Downloaded As Blacklisted Songs
treatUndownloadedSongsAsBlacklistedSongs.description:
<cl>Original idea by NotPumpShotgun.</c>

Song you haven't downloaded will be treated as a blacklisted song.

dontPlaySongAtAll.name: Don't Play Replacement Songs (Use Empty Song Instead)
